name: Bug report
about: Create a report to help us improve
title: ''
labels: ''
assignees: ''

---

Report a bug using this template, if you dont have a github account you can do it on the Trello as well.

```
Bug Title: 
Bug Type(UI/Feature):
Description of Bug:
How to recreate: 

Link to Screenshot(Imgur or whatever):

System Info(Optional)
  - OS: 
  - CPU
  - RAM: 
  - Java:

Anything else:
```
